title: How They Do It…
description: Educational series showing how various things are done. Includes the classic episode on how they make a plumbus.
altHero: a machine stamping a big sheet of pink material
alt1: a factory worker next to hanging drapery of pink with colorful flecks of something all over it
alt2: a worker holds a pink bulb-like object covered in bumps
alt3: a worker takes a big knife to little green creatures
alt4: a worker showcases a finished plumbus
